description: Configuration for storing the range of extracted datapoints and events to a persistent store

interval.description: Interval between each write to the buffer file, in seconds. 0 or less disables the state store. Alternatively use `N[timeunit]` where `timeunit` is one of `w`, `d`, `h`, `m`, `s`, or `ms`

variable-store.description: Name of raw table or litedb store for variable ranges

event-store.description: Name of raw table or litedb store for event ranges

influx-variable-store.description: Name of raw table or litedb store for influxdb failure buffer variable ranges

influx-event-store.description: Name of raw table or litedb store for influxdb failure buffer event ranges
